en-US.Error_ConfirmAPIN_NotMatch: Oops. The reconfirm did not reconfirm. Please enter the same PIN in both boxes.
en-US.Tip_UCIC: Your Customer ID is a 10 digit unique reference number found in your welcome kit
en-US.Tip_CardNumber: Please enter the 16 digit debit card number printed on your debit card
en-US.Tip_Expiry: Enter month and year as shown on the front of your debit card

en-US.Tip_ConfirmAPIN: Please confirm your Debit Card PIN
